entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to as 'we' in the conversation with Cho.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who is being pursued by him romantically.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: The Potions teacher at Hogwarts, mentioned as the one giving a test to Harry and others.

relationships.description: Harry is interested in Cho romantically, but struggles to approach her due to her popularity and his own lack of confidence.
Harry is a student in Snape's Potions class, receiving bottom marks on the test due to forgetting an ingredient.
